CustomField.description: Accounts with at least one placed order event are first classified as ecommerce. Of the remaining, if the website URL is bad or is for a 'coming soon' store, these are tagged as Website Unavailable. ~30% that remain are run through mechanical turk thrice to classify as Ecom or not. Accounts classified similarly at least 2 out of 3 times by Mturk are given that classification. Blanks are new accounts that have not been run through Mturk yet.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Accounts with at least one placed order event = ecommerce. Of remaining, if website URL is bad or is for a 'coming soon' store, these are tagged as Website Unavailable. ~30% that remain are run through mechanical turk thrice to classify as Ecom or not.
CustomField.label: Commerce Type
